description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. myChristmas is bringing back the festive magic to xbox 360. Featuring 10 Christmas carols and our next gen 3d engine. Decorate and light your Christmas tree, stretch out in front of a Yule log fire or get a group of friends together and go Christmas caroling over Xbox Live with your avatars. Experience first hand the awesome magic of Santa arriving, it just wouldn't be myChristmas without him.
